title: Cannot read property 'changedBits' of undefined
body:
<!--
  Note: if the issue is about documentation or the website, please file it at:
  https://github.com/reactjs/reactjs.org/issues/new
-->

**Do you want to request a *feature* or report a *bug*?**
Bug

**What is the current behavior?**
Using the new Context API in React Native app ends up with an exception.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1096340/38962404-688d5ef2-436d-11e8-963d-dc2548214960.png)

Unfortunately, I am unable to provide viable reproduction environment. I tried the [CodeSandbox](https://codesandbox.io/s/n98wxj99p) and [Snack Expo](https://snack.expo.io/SkdktSHhz) and both are working just fine. This is happening in my React Native app running on my Android phone. Only thing I've got is this screenshot from the debugger.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1096340/38962135-2532816a-436c-11e8-8bd7-c05c8a9338c2.png)

Strangely enough if that code on line `8439` would read `providerFiber.type._context` then it would have been working correctly. Any chance there is a typo? :)

```tsx
export const rootContext = React.createContext<TRootModel>()
export const RootProvider = rootContext.Provider

export const App = () => (
  <RootProvider value={RootModel.create()}>
    <Text>OK</Text>
  </RootProvider>
)
```

**Which versions of React, and which browser / OS are affected by this issue? Did this work in previous versions of React?**

 * react: 16.3.2
 * react-native: 0.54.2
 * Windows 10 x64
